description: Returns first row of data from result. This action is useful if you want just a single row, as in 'SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id=13'
name: execute.row

database.description: Database name if not specified in config.

params.description: Parameters for interpolation in the query_string.

password.description: Database password if not specified in config.

query_string.description: Query to send to MS SQL Server.

server.description: Database host if not specified in config.

user.description: Database user if not specified in config.
